headline: Your Next Great Friendship Awaits
valueProposition: Weekly curated small group meetups with matched physicians
subheadline: Life in medicine can be isolating. BeyondRounds matches you with fellow doctors who share your interests, lifestyle, and values —
subheadlineBold: because the best friendships start with common ground.
ctaMicroCopy: No spam · Every doctor is verified
ctaTitle: Find Doctors You Actually Want to Meet
ctaSubtext: Every week, small groups of verified doctors meet in real life. No swiping. No awkward chats. Just real connections.
ctaClosingQuote: I met two of my closest friends through BeyondRounds. We still meet every month.
howSubtitle: Finding meaningful friendships shouldn't be left to chance. Here's how we make it happen.
step1Desc: Tell us about yourself — your specialty, interests, lifestyle, and what you're looking for in friendships. So you don't waste time meeting the wrong people.
step2Desc: Every Thursday at 4 PM, you'll receive a small group of 3-4 doctors matched based on shared interests, compatible schedules, and location proximity.
step3Desc: Connect through our group chat, plan a meetup, and discover friendships that go beyond the hospital. RoundsBot helps break the ice!
testimonialQuote: I finally found colleagues here who really get me.
testimonialQuote2: BeyondRounds matched me with people I actually want to grab coffee with.
